items.title: Pete Hegseth’s ‘Kill Everybody’ Command
items.description: The secretary of war’s alleged order that led to drug boat–strike survivors’ being killed appears to be a violation of the norms of warfare.

items.title: Gavin Newsom’s Achilles’ Heel
items.description: The governor is one of the top 2028 Democratic contenders, but Scott Wiener’s radical record leaves Newsom vulnerable to attack.

items.title: How Europe Fell Behind
items.description: Brussels regulated first and asked questions never, among other reasons.

items.description: Another gut-wrenching day for the country.
